author: rhuijben
msg: Fix a few problems in svn_wc__db_read_info(), svn_wc__db_read_children_info()
and svn_wc__db_base_get_info().
Before this patch the relatively new had_props was TRUE when the NODES table
only had an empty list of properties.
The have_base value of svn_wc__db_read_children_info() was only set to true
if the BASE node was found after the used WORKING row.
* subversion/libsvn_wc/status.c
(read_info): Just fetch has_props.
(assemble_status): Simplify if.
* subversion/libsvn_wc/wc_db.c
(SQLITE_PROPERTIES_AVAILABLE): New define.
(base_get_info,
read_info): Use SQLITE_PROPERTIES_AVAILABLE to determine had_props.
(read_children_info_item_t): Remove pointer trickery by using an outer
struct.
Don't read an empty list of properties in a hash to find SVN_PROP_SPECIAL.
Calculate have_base correctly.
Create a cleared item for actual only nodes (and use the right size for
allocation instead of a struct + a half op_depth).
